datafield.subfield: The recent results of the work carried out by the laboratory of charged particle accelerators information systems in Department of Electrophysical facilities NRNU MEPhI are considered. The researches are connected with the creation of the data-processing support center and remote access of the main educational cycles (within the department). The creation process of the virtual electrophysics laboratories, which can simulate the operation of the main accelerators subsystems and the related research work, is also considered..
